ca.uwaterloo.epad.xml

Class SaveFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.epad.xml.SaveFile

  • public class SaveFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a save file created by ePad application and also handles saving the workspace and loading the save files.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin

    • Field Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SaveFile() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean load(java.lang.String filename)
      Load the specified save file and retrieve the recorded data such as user's name, time stamp as well as the paths to the thumbnail, drawing and layout files.
      boolean save(java.lang.String userName)
      Create a save file for the specified user and save the current drawing and workspace layout.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public boolean save(java.lang.String userName)
        Create a save file for the specified user and save the current drawing and workspace layout.
        Parameters:
        userName - name of the user
        Returns:
        true if the file was saved successfully and false if something went wrong

      • load

        public boolean load(java.lang.String filename)
        Load the specified save file and retrieve the recorded data such as user's name, time stamp as well as the paths to the thumbnail, drawing and layout files.
        Parameters:
        filename - valid path to a save file to load
        Returns:
        true if the file was loaded and parsed successfully and false if something went wrong
